mapper.select: SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM tb_user WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_pwd = SHA2(#{userPwd}, 256) AND use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT TU.user_id AS userId , TU.CORP_CD AS corpCd , VC.CORP_NM AS corpNm , TU.CORP_GB AS corpGb , TU.user_nm AS userNm , TU.user_pwd AS userPwd , TU.user_gb AS userGb , TU.auth_grp_cd AS authGrpCd , GET_CODE_NM('AUTH_GRP_CD', TU.auth_grp_cd ) AS authGrpNm FROM TB_USER TU LEFT JOIN VW_CORP VC ON VC.CORP_CD = TU.CORP_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND TU.USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PWD = SHA2(#{userPwd}, 256) AND TU.USE_YN = 'Y' LIMIT 1
SELECT a.auth_grp_cd as authGrpCd FROM tb_user a INNER JOIN tb_auth_grp_menu c ON c.auth_grp_cd = a.auth_grp_cd WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.use_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY a.auth_grp_cd

SELECT a.menu_cd AS menuCd , a.menu_nm AS menuNm , a.menu_tp AS menuTp , a.menu_url AS menuUrl , a.use_yn AS useYn , a.ent_dttm AS entDttm , a.upt_dttm AS uptDttm , a.ent_user_id AS entUserId , a.upt_user_id AS uptUserId , a.menu_prnt_cd AS menuPrntCd , a.menu_ord AS menuOrd , a.view_yn AS viewYn , a.site_gb_cd AS siteGbCd , a.view_icon AS viewIcon FROM tb_menu a LEFT JOIN tb_auth_grp_menu b ON a.menu_cd = b.menu_cd WHERE a.menu_prnt_cd = 'M' AND b.auth_grp_cd = #{authGrpCd} AND a.use_yn = 'Y' AND a.view_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY a.menu_prnt_cd, a.menu_ord

SELECT a.menu_cd AS menuCd , a.menu_nm AS menuNm , a.menu_tp AS menuTp , a.menu_url AS menuUrl , a.use_yn AS useYn , a.ent_dttm AS entDttm , a.upt_dttm AS uptDttm , a.ent_user_id AS entUserId , a.upt_user_id AS uptUserId , a.menu_prnt_cd AS menuPrntCd , a.menu_ord AS menuOrd , a.view_yn AS viewYn , a.site_gb_cd AS siteGbCd , a.view_icon AS viewIcon FROM tb_menu a LEFT JOIN tb_auth_grp_menu b ON a.menu_cd = b.menu_cd WHERE a.menu_prnt_cd IN #{item.menuCd} AND b.auth_grp_cd = #{authGrpCd} AND a.use_yn = 'Y' AND a.view_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY a.menu_prnt_cd, a.menu_ord
